public class PublicationService
extends AbstractItemService

PublicationService

The Australian National University

Service for retrieving and updating publications within the metadata stores

Author:
Genevieve Turner

getPublicationItem

public PublicationItem getPublicationItem(String ariesId)
Tries to find an aries record within the database. If it does not find it it searches the aries database and saves it.

Parameters:
ariesId - The id of the aries record to return an item for
Returns:
The publication item for the given aries id

searchPublicationPerson

                                                String givenName,
                                                String surname)
Searches for the people that match the publication with an author that has the provided given and surnames

Parameters:
iid - The item id of the publication
givenName - The given name
surname - The surname
Returns:
The list of people that match
